word_mean: 腐败，腐化：酶性分解(尤为蛋白)产生恶味的物质，如硫化氢、氨和硫醇。参见 fermentation

sentence.Network_en: Expert: This kind of shrimp has been putrefaction.
sentence.Network_cn: 专家: 这种虾已经是腐败变质了.

sentence.Network_en: Rome had fallen into moral putrefaction.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗马社会曾陷入过道德腐败的状况.

sentence.Network_en: Proteolysis and putrefaction are typical results of microbial spoilage of such high - protein materials.
sentence.Network_cn: 蛋白水解和腐化是这些 高蛋白 物质发生微生物变质的典型结果.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French, or from late Latin putrefactio(n-), from putrefacere 'make rotten' (see putrefy)

entry.def: Putrefaction is the process of decay.

means.word_mean: 1. decay usually accompanied by an offensive odor
2. (biology) decaying caused by bacterial or fungal action

auth_sentence.content: Animal substances dissolved by putrefaction...emit phlogiston.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Animal substances dissolved by putrefaction...emit phlogiston.

auth_sentence.content: Damaged cells, through putrefaction, take the pressure off healthy cells allowing cell division or healing.
auth_sentence.res_content: Damaged cells, through putrefaction, take the pressure off healthy cells allowing cell division or healing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Damaged cells, through putrefaction, take the pressure off healthy cells allowing cell division or healing.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 表名词,"达到的状态",由-fy转化而来

stems_affixes.word_buile: putrefy使腐烂+action达到的状态→n.腐坏,腐败
satisfy满意+action达到的状态→satisfy的名词形式
putrefy[v.使腐烂]+action表名词→n.腐坏,腐败
putr腐烂+escent开始……的→v.开始腐烂,变得腐败
